articles.title: „Diese Waffe ist als Massenvernichtungswaffe zu bezeichnen“
articles.image_title: DIESES FOTO WIRD VON DER RUSSISCHEN STAATSAGENTUR TASS ZUR VERFÜGUNG GESTELLT. [OCTOBER 20, 2022: 9K720 Iskander-M short-range 9K720 Iskander-M short-range ballistic missile systems of Russias Central Military District take part in the special military operation. An Iskander-M crew has carried out a successful strike on a Ukrainian military target. With tension escalating in Donbass in February, the Russian Armed Forces launched a special military operation in Ukraine in response to appeals for help from the Donetsk and Lugansk People's Republics. Video screen grab. Best quality available. Russian Defence Ministry/TASS]
